description: A simulated workplace environment with 5 databases (email, calendar, analytics, project_management, customer_relationship_manager) plus a company directory utility, totaling 27 tools for managing business activities.
system_prompt: Today's date is Thursday, 2026-01-29 and the current time is 23:59:00. Remember the current date and time when answering queries. Meetings must not start before 9am or end after 6pm.

common_multi_step_patterns.description: Look up a person's email address, then send them an email
common_multi_step_patterns.example_request: Send an email to John about the quarterly review meeting tomorrow

common_multi_step_patterns.description: Search for an email, then forward it to someone after looking up their address
common_multi_step_patterns.example_request: Forward the latest email about the budget report to Sarah

common_multi_step_patterns.description: Search for a specific email, then reply to it
common_multi_step_patterns.example_request: Reply to Carlos's last email about the prototype with 'Thanks, I'll review it tomorrow'

common_multi_step_patterns.description: Search for emails matching criteria, then delete multiple emails
common_multi_step_patterns.example_request: Delete all emails from last week about the cancelled project

common_multi_step_patterns.description: Get specific information from an email, then forward it based on content
common_multi_step_patterns.example_request: Check who sent the email about the deadline and forward it to the project lead

common_multi_step_patterns.description: Look up a person's email, then create a calendar event with them
common_multi_step_patterns.example_request: Schedule a 30-minute meeting with Lisa tomorrow at 2pm called 'Project Sync'

common_multi_step_patterns.description: Search for calendar events, then update multiple events
common_multi_step_patterns.example_request: Reschedule all of Mike's meetings on Friday to start 1 hour later

common_multi_step_patterns.description: Search for calendar events, then delete multiple events
common_multi_step_patterns.example_request: Cancel all meetings with the vendor next week

common_multi_step_patterns.description: Get specific event information, then update based on that info
common_multi_step_patterns.example_request: Change the name of the last event on December 1st to 'Risk Management Forum'

common_multi_step_patterns.description: Query multiple analytics metrics for comparison or reporting
common_multi_step_patterns.example_request: Get me the total visits, engaged users, and social media traffic for last month

common_multi_step_patterns.description: Query analytics data, then create a visualization
common_multi_step_patterns.example_request: Show me total visits for November and create a bar chart of daily visits

common_multi_step_patterns.description: Look up specific visitor information and get session statistics
common_multi_step_patterns.example_request: Get details on visitor V12345 and compare their session to the average

common_multi_step_patterns.description: Compare multiple traffic sources over a time period
common_multi_step_patterns.example_request: Compare direct vs referral vs search engine traffic for the last 2 weeks

common_multi_step_patterns.description: Look up a person's email, then create a task assigned to them
common_multi_step_patterns.example_request: Create a new Backend task 'Fix login bug' in the Backlog assigned to Alex, due next Friday

common_multi_step_patterns.description: Search for tasks, then update multiple tasks
common_multi_step_patterns.example_request: Move all of Sarah's In Progress tasks on the Backend board to In Review

common_multi_step_patterns.description: Search for tasks, then delete multiple tasks
common_multi_step_patterns.example_request: Delete all completed tasks on the Design board from last month

common_multi_step_patterns.description: Look up two people's emails, search for tasks, then reassign them
common_multi_step_patterns.example_request: Reassign all of Tom's Frontend tasks to Jennifer

common_multi_step_patterns.description: Get specific task information, then update it
common_multi_step_patterns.example_request: Check who's assigned to task 00000123 and change the due date to next week

common_multi_step_patterns.description: Look up a sales rep's email, then add a new customer assigned to them
common_multi_step_patterns.example_request: Add a new lead 'Acme Corp' interested in Software, assigned to Maria

common_multi_step_patterns.description: Search for customers, then update multiple customer records
common_multi_step_patterns.example_request: Raj is taking over all of Akira's software leads. Reassign them in the CRM.

common_multi_step_patterns.description: Search for customers, then delete multiple customer records
common_multi_step_patterns.example_request: Delete all of Lena's won customers interested in services from the CRM

common_multi_step_patterns.description: Search for customers by criteria including date, then update their status
common_multi_step_patterns.example_request: Move all hardware proposals that haven't been contacted in 4 weeks to Lost

common_multi_step_patterns.description: Search emails for meeting details, then create calendar events
common_multi_step_patterns.example_request: Find the email about the client meeting and schedule it on the calendar with attendees

common_multi_step_patterns.description: Search calendar for events, then send email notifications
common_multi_step_patterns.example_request: Find tomorrow's meetings and send a reminder email to all participants

common_multi_step_patterns.description: Search tasks, then send email updates about them
common_multi_step_patterns.example_request: Email the team lead about all overdue Backend tasks

common_multi_step_patterns.description: Search CRM for customers needing follow-up, then schedule meetings
common_multi_step_patterns.example_request: Schedule follow-up meetings for all qualified leads with follow-up dates this week

common_multi_step_patterns.description: Search CRM, then send emails to customers or sales reps
common_multi_step_patterns.example_request: Send a thank-you email to all customers marked as Won this month

common_multi_step_patterns.description: Query analytics data, then send a report via email
common_multi_step_patterns.example_request: Get this week's website stats and email the summary to the marketing manager
